        public GlobalSearchScope getModuleWithDependentsScope()
        Specified by:
        getModuleWithDependentsScope in interface Module

      • getModuleTestsWithDependentsScope

        Specified by:

      • getModuleRuntimeScope

        public GlobalSearchScope getModuleRuntimeScope(boolean includeTests)
        Specified by:
        getModuleRuntimeScope in interface Module
        Parameters:
        includeTests - whether test source and test dependencies should be included
        Returns:
        a scope including production (and optionally test) source of this module and all modules and libraries it depends upon, including runtime and transitive dependencies, even if they're not exported.
